LogAuthUpdated(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when a SmartLending auth is updated

params.auth: address of auth whose status is being updated

LogDeployerUpdated(address,bool).details: Emitted when a deployer is modified by owner

LogSetCreationCode(address).details: Emitted when the smart lending creation code is modified by owner

params.creationCodePointer: address of the creation code pointer

LogSmartLendingDeployed(uint256,address).details: Emitted when a new smart lending is deployed

params.dexId: The ID of the deployed DEX
params.smartLending: The address of the deployed smart lending

params.dexId_: The ID of the DEX for which the smart lending wrapper is being deployed

smartLendingCreationCode().details: Retrieves the creation code for the SmartLending contract

params.data_: Data to execute at the delegated address
params.target_: Address to which the call needs to be delegated

params.allowed_: Bool flag for whether address is allowed as deployer or not
params.deployer_: Address to set deployer value for

params.smartLending_: The address of the SmartLending contract

FluidDexSwapResult(uint256).notice: used to simulate swap to find the output amount

deploy(uint256).notice: Deploys a new SmartLending contract. Only callable by deployers.

isDeployer(address).notice: Reads if a certain `deployer_` address is an allowed deployer or not. Owner is deployer by default.

isSmartLendingAuth(address,address).notice: Reads if a certain `auth_` address is an allowed auth for `smartLending_` or not. Owner is auth by default.

setSmartLendingCreationCode(bytes).notice: Sets the `creationCode_` bytecode for new SmartLending contracts. Only callable by owner.

spell(address,bytes).notice: Spell allows owner aka governance to do any arbitrary call on factory

updateDeployer(address,bool).notice: Sets an address as allowed deployer or not. Only callable by owner.

updateSmartLendingAuth(address,address,b.notice: Updates the authorization status of an address for a SmartLending contract. Only callable by owner.
